text:
@robreiner You’ve always been a pig, Reiner—& nothing has changed.
Imagine how bad Chinese covid-19 pandemic would have been if the Dems had been in charge. Weren’t they the ones who claimed it wasn’t a problem & keep the borders open? 
Stupid Pelosi said go party in Chinatown.
Think, u POS
